This creature enters with nineteen -1/-1 counters on it.
Whenever you remove one or more -1/-1 counter from this creature, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you don't, draw a card.
{T}: Invoke 1. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Remove X -1/-1 counters from an Avatar you control. If you don't control an Avatar, create a 20/20 Avatar creature token with nineteen -1/-1 counters first.)[/i]
